numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that legacy applicants have a higher acceptance rate.

3. I wonder why a legacy applicant has a higher advantage if the legacy applicant has more money.
4. I wonder why a college seems to want money.
5. I wonder why a college seems to want the importance of a person.
7. Not everybody wants to start a career.
8. Not everybody wants to go to college.

14. If a person has more status, then the person will be accepted more.
